event.description: Jordan Schafer flies out to right fielder Brett Carroll.
Marwin Gonzalez grounds out to first baseman Mark DeRosa.
Brian Bogusevic strikes out swinging.
J. D. Martinez grounds out, shortstop Ian Desmond to first baseman Mark DeRosa.
Fernando Martinez doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Jayson Werth.
Matt Downs lines out to second baseman Danny Espinosa.
Brett Wallace flies out to left fielder Jason Michaels.
Chris Johnson called out on strikes.
Chris Snyder homers (1) on a fly ball to left field.
Jordan Schafer doubles (1) on a ground ball to right fielder Brett Carroll.
With Marwin Gonzalez batting, wild pitch by Stephen Strasburg, Jordan Schafer to 3rd.
Marwin Gonzalez strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Tom Gorzelanny replaces Stephen Strasburg.
Brian Bogusevic hit by pitch.
J. D. Martinez homers (1) on a fly ball to left field. Jordan Schafer scores. Brian Bogusevic scores.
Fernando Martinez walks.
Matt Downs reaches on force attempt, fielding error by shortstop Ian Desmond. Fernando Martinez to 2nd.
Brett Wallace strikes out swinging.
Chris Johnson singles on a ground ball to right fielder Brett Carroll.
Chris Snyder walks. Chris Johnson to 2nd.
Jordan Schafer out on a sacrifice bunt, catcher Wilson Ramos to first baseman Mark DeRosa. Chris Johnson to 3rd. Chris Snyder to 2nd.
Marwin Gonzalez reaches on a fielder's choice out, third baseman Ryan Zimmerman to catcher Wilson Ramos. Chris Johnson out at home. Chris Snyder to 3rd.
Brian Bogusevic walks. Marwin Gonzalez to 2nd.
J. D. Martinez walks. Chris Snyder scores. Marwin Gonzalez to 3rd. Brian Bogusevic to 2nd.
With Fernando Martinez batting, wild pitch by Tom Gorzelanny, Marwin Gonzalez scores. Brian Bogusevic to 3rd. J. D. Martinez to 2nd.
Fernando Martinez homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field. Brian Bogusevic scores. J. D. Martinez scores.
Pitcher Change: Ryan Mattheus replaces Tom Gorzelanny.
Matt Downs reaches on fielding error by shortstop Ian Desmond.
With Brett Wallace batting, wild pitch by Ryan Mattheus, Matt Downs to 2nd.
Brett Wallace walks.
Chris Johnson flies out to center fielder Jayson Werth.
Defensive Substitution: Anthony Rendon replaces shortstop Ian Desmond, batting 1st, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Jarrett Hoffpauir replaces second baseman Danny Espinosa, batting 2nd, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Chad Tracy replaces third baseman Ryan Zimmerman, batting 3rd, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Eury Perez replaces right fielder Brett Carroll, batting 9th, playing center field.
Mark Teahen remains in the game as the third baseman.
Defensive Substitution: Carlos Maldonado replaces catcher Wilson Ramos, batting 7th, playing catcher.
Corey Brown remains in the game as the left fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Bryce Harper replaces center fielder Jayson Werth, batting 5th, playing right field.
Chris Snyder called out on strikes.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter George Springer replaces Jordan Schafer.
George Springer strikes out swinging.
Marwin Gonzalez grounds out, shortstop Anthony Rendon to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Pitcher Change: Jeff Fulchino replaces Ryan Mattheus.
Brad Snyder flies out to left fielder Corey Brown.
Justin Ruggiano pops out to first baseman Chad Tracy in foul territory.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Scott Moore replaces Fernando Martinez.
Scott Moore singles on a line drive to left fielder Corey Brown.
Joe Thurston grounds out to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Pitcher Change: Brad Lidge replaces Jeff Fulchino.
Diory Hernandez flies out to right fielder Bryce Harper.
Jonathan Singleton strikes out swinging, catcher Carlos Maldonado to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Rene Garcia grounds out, second baseman Jarrett Hoffpauir to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Tyler Moore remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Tyler Clippard replaces Brad Lidge.
George Springer strikes out swinging.
Brian Bixler triples (1) on a fly ball to right fielder Bryce Harper.
Brad Snyder walks.
Justin Ruggiano out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Corey Brown. Brian Bixler scores.
Scott Moore walks. Brad Snyder to 2nd.
Joe Thurston flies out to left fielder Corey Brown.
Pitcher Change: Drew Storen replaces Tyler Clippard.
Diory Hernandez grounds out, second baseman Jarrett Hoffpauir to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Jonathan Singleton called out on strikes.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Delino DeShields replaces Rene Garcia.
Delino DeShields called out on strikes.
Ian Desmond grounds out, second baseman Matt Downs to first baseman Chris Johnson.
Danny Espinosa singles on a line drive to center fielder Jordan Schafer.
Ryan Zimmerman grounds into double play, second baseman Matt Downs to first baseman Chris Johnson. Danny Espinosa out at 2nd.
Michael Morse walks.
Jayson Werth strikes out swinging.
Mark DeRosa singles on a ground ball to left fielder J. Martinez. Michael Morse to 2nd.
Wilson Ramos flies out to right fielder Brian Bogusevic.
Jason Michaels singles on a fly ball to center fielder Jordan Schafer. Michael Morse scores. Mark DeRosa to 3rd. Jason Michaels to 2nd on the throw.
Brett Carroll grounds out, shortstop Marwin Gonzalez to first baseman Chris Johnson.
Pitcher Change: Henry Sosa replaces J. A. Happ.
Ian Desmond pops out to shortstop Marwin Gonzalez.
Danny Espinosa lines out to left fielder J. Martinez.
Ryan Zimmerman singles on a line drive to center fielder Jordan Schafer.
Michael Morse singles on a ground ball to third baseman Brett Wallace. Ryan Zimmerman to 2nd.
Jayson Werth pops out to second baseman Matt Downs.
Mark DeRosa singles on a ground ball to right fielder Brian Bogusevic.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Mark Teahen replaces Mark DeRosa.
With Wilson Ramos batting, passed ball by Chris Snyder, Mark Teahen to 2nd.
Wilson Ramos grounds out, third baseman Brett Wallace to first baseman Chris Johnson.
Jason Michaels singles on a line drive to left fielder J. D. Martinez. Mark Teahen to 3rd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Corey Brown replaces Jason Michaels.
Brett Carroll strikes out swinging.
Ian Desmond strikes out swinging.
George Springer remains in the game as the center fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Brian Bixler replaces shortstop Marwin Gonzalez, batting 2nd, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Brad Snyder replaces right fielder Brian Bogusevic, batting 3rd, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Justin Ruggiano replaces left fielder J. Martinez, batting 4th, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Joe Thurston replaces second baseman Matt Downs, batting 6th, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Diory Hernandez replaces third baseman Brett Wallace, batting 7th, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Jonathan Singleton replaces first baseman Chris Johnson, batting 8th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Rene Garcia replaces catcher Chris Snyder, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Paul Clemens replaces Henry Sosa.
Jarrett Hoffpauir grounds out, shortstop Brian Bixler to first baseman Jonathan Singleton.
Chad Tracy grounds out, second baseman Joe Thurston to first baseman Jonathan Singleton.
Michael Morse grounds out, shortstop Brian Bixler to first baseman Jonathan Singleton.
Scott Moore remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Lucas Harrell replaces Paul Clemens.
Bryce Harper singles on a ground ball to shortstop Brian Bixler.
Mark Teahen called out on strikes.
Carlos Maldonado grounds into double play, third baseman Diory Hernandez to second baseman Joe Thurston to first baseman Jonathan Singleton. Bryce Harper out at 2nd.
Corey Brown singles on a line drive to center fielder George Springer.
Eury Perez grounds out, shortstop Brian Bixler to first baseman Jonathan Singleton. Corey Brown to 2nd.
Anthony Rendon pops out to first baseman Jonathan Singleton in foul territory.
Jarrett Hoffpauir walks.
Chad Tracy singles on a ground ball to right fielder Brad Snyder. Corey Brown scores. Jarrett Hoffpauir to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Tyler Moore replaces Michael Morse.
Tyler Moore lines out to shortstop Brian Bixler.
Pitcher Change: Fernando Rodriguez replaces Lucas Harrell.
Bryce Harper called out on strikes.
Mark Teahen grounds out to first baseman Jonathan Singleton.
Carlos Maldonado called out on strikes.

Defensive Substitution: Brandon Barnes replaces shortstop Brian Bixler, batting 2nd, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Jake Goebbert replaces right fielder Brad Snyder, batting 3rd, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Mike Kvasnicka replaces second baseman Joe Thurston, batting 6th, playing catcher.
Delino DeShields remains in the game as the second baseman.

Corey Brown grounds out, first baseman Jonathan Singleton to pitcher David Carpenter.
Eury Perez singles on a line drive to center fielder Brandon Barnes.
Defensive switch from second base to second base for Delino DeShields.
Pitcher Change: David Carpenter replaces David Carpenter.
